about_me.en: I am Guangyang Deng, a 1-year M.S. student from Xiamen University, advised by Professor Zhirong Shen.  My research focus is disaggregated memory.
about_me.zh: 我是邓光阳，来自厦门大学的一年级硕士研究生，导师是沈志荣教授。我的研究重点是分散式存储。
